description.value:
Wearer must have Psyker Trait. Can target individual within line of Sight as Full Action with Ranged and Concentration subtypes, making -20 Willpower Test (or -30 if character not dedicated to Tzeentch). For each Degree of Success, target loses the ability to use one Psychic Power for the remainder of the encounter, chosen randomly.

Requirements

Strange ever shifting pendants, worn as necklaces, wristbands, etc.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
